verses.verse: Paul,<WG3972> an apostle<WG652> of Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547> by<WG2596> the commandment<WG2003> of God<WG2316> our<WG2257> Savior,<WG4990> and<WG2532> Lord<WG2962> Jesus<WG2424> Christ,<WG5547> which is our<WG2257> hope;<WG1680>

To Timothy<WG5095>, my own<WG1103> son<WG5043> in<WG1722> the faith<WG4102>: Grace<WG5485>, mercy<WG1656>, and peace<WG1515>, from<WG575> God<WG2316> our<WG2257> Father<WG3962> and<WG2532> Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547> our<WG2257> Lord<WG2962>.

As<WG2531> I begged<WG3870> you<WG4571> to stay<WG4357> at<WG1722> Ephesus<WG2181>, when I went<WG4198> into<WG1519> Macedonia<WG3109>, that<WG2443> you might command<WG3853> some<WG5100> that they teach<WG2085> no<WG3361> other teaching<WG2085>,

Neither<WG3366> to pay attention to<WG4337> fables<WG3454> and<WG2532> endless<WG562> genealogies<WG1076>, which<WG3748> minister<WG3930> questions<WG2214>, rather<WG3123> than<WG2228> godly<WG2316> edifying<WG3620> which is<WG3588> in<WG1722> faith<WG4102>: so do.

Now<WG1161> the end<WG5056> of the commandment<WG3852> is<WG2076> love<WG26> out of<WG1537> a pure<WG2513> heart<WG2588>, and<WG2532> of a good<WG18> conscience<WG4893>, and<WG2532> of faith<WG4102> unfeigned<WG505>:
From which<WG3739> some<WG5100> having swerved<WG795> have turned aside<WG1624> unto<WG1519> vain babbling<WG3150>;
Desiring<WG2309> to be<WG1511> teachers of the law<WG3547>; understanding<WG3539> neither<WG3383> what<WG3739> they say<WG3004>, nor<WG3383> what<WG4012> they affirm<WG1226>.
But<WG1161> we know<WG1492> that<WG3754> the law<WG3551> is good<WG2570>, if<WG1437> a man<WG5100> uses<WG5530> it<WG846> lawfully<WG3545>;

Knowing<WG1492> this<WG5124>, that<WG3754> the law<WG3551> is<WG2749> not<WG3756> made for<WG2749> a righteous man<WG1342>, but<WG1161> for the lawless<WG459> and<WG2532> disobedient<WG506>, for the ungodly<WG765> and<WG2532> for sinners<WG268>, for unholy<WG462> and<WG2532> profane<WG952>, for murderers of fathers<WG3964> and<WG2532> murderers of mothers<WG3389>, for manslayers<WG409>,

For whoremongers<WG4205>, for them that defile themselves with mankind<WG733>, for slavers<WG405>, for liars<WG5583>, for perjured persons<WG1965>, and<WG2532> if<WG1487> there is<WG480> any<WG5100> other thing<WG2087> that is contrary to<WG480> sound<WG5198> teaching<WG1319>;
According to<WG2596> the glorious<WG1391> gospel<WG2098> of the blessed<WG3107> God<WG2316>, which<WG3739> was committed to<WG4100> my<WG1473> trust<WG4100>.

And<WG2532> I<WG2192> thank<WG5485> Christ<WG5547> Jesus<WG2424> our<WG2257> Lord<WG2962>, who has enabled<WG1743> me<WG3165>, for that<WG3754> he counted<WG2233> me<WG3165> faithful<WG4103>, putting me<WG5087> into<WG1519> the ministry<WG1248>;

Who was<WG5607> before<WG4386> a blasphemer<WG989>, and<WG2532> a persecutor<WG1376>, and<WG2532> injurious<WG5197>: but<WG235> I obtained mercy<WG1653>, because<WG3754> I did<WG4160> it ignorantly<WG50> in<WG1722> unbelief<WG570>.
And<WG1161> the grace<WG5485> of our<WG2257> Lord<WG2962> was exceedingly abundant<WG5250> with<WG3326> faith<WG4102> and<WG2532> love<WG26> which is<WG3588> in<WG1722> Christ<WG5547> Jesus<WG2424>.

This<WG3588> is a faithful<WG4103> saying<WG3056>, and<WG2532> worthy<WG514> of all<WG3956> acceptance<WG594>, that<WG3754> Christ<WG5547> Jesus<WG2424> came<WG2064> into<WG1519> the world<WG2889> to save<WG4982> sinners<WG268>; of whom<WG3739> I<WG1473> am<WG1510> chief<WG4413>.

But<WG235> for<WG1223> this cause<WG5124> I obtained mercy<WG1653>, that<WG2443> in<WG1722> me<WG1698> first<WG4413> Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547> might show forth<WG1731> all<WG3956> patience<WG3115>, for<WG4314> a pattern<WG5296> to them which should hereafter<WG3195> believe<WG4100> on<WG1909> him<WG846> to<WG1519> life<WG2222> everlasting<WG166>.

Now<WG1161> unto the King<WG935> eternal<WG165>, immortal<WG862>, invisible<WG517>, the only<WG3441> wise<WG4680> God<WG2316>, be honor<WG5092> and<WG2532> glory<WG1391> for<WG1519> ever<WG165> and ever<WG165>. Amen<WG281>.

This<WG3778> charge<WG3852> I commit<WG3908> unto you<WG4671>, son<WG5043> Timothy<WG5095>, according to<WG2596> the prophecies<WG4394> which went ahead<WG4254> to<WG1909> you<WG4571>, that<WG2443> you<WG4754> by<WG1722> them<WG846> might fight<WG4754> a good<WG2570> war<WG4752>;
Holding<WG2192> faith<WG4102>, and<WG2532> a good<WG18> conscience<WG4893>; which<WG3739> some<WG5100> having put away<WG683> concerning<WG4012> faith<WG4102> have made shipwreck<WG3489>:

Of whom<WG3739> is<WG2076> Hymenaeus<WG5211> and<WG2532> Alexander<WG223>; whom<WG3739> I have delivered<WG3860> unto Satan<WG4567>, that<WG2443> they may learn<WG3811> not<WG3361> to blaspheme<WG987>.
